name: new world (aidamac)
description:
The kingdoms of Reddyland and the Marine Valley had always lived in peace, until one day, the Red King built a strange castle in the blue kingdom. The castle, named New World, wrecked havoc upon the Marine Valley, stealing its life and creating its own. 

Now, a young girl named Minerva Mouse has been born from New World's stolen life force. What awaits her inside the Red King's bizarre domain?

------------

[In 1994, Disney's expansion into Paris was met with such objection that it was forced to close. This RPG serves as an allegory to that story,  and focuses on the mistakes that Disney and then CEO Michael Eisner had made while developing the park.

Developed for ENGL102-05 at the University of Idaho.]
